name: Manafest: Arena
description:
A first-person shooter made on a three month timeframe (Which ends April 4th, 2019).  Until the aforementioned date, I'll be taking and responding to feedback on this project. 

This project is free and open source, released with an MIT licence.
The source can be found here https://github.com/blukatstudios/ManafestArena

Controls:
WASD - movement
Shift - Sprint
Left click - Primary use
Right click - secondary use
Tab- cycle item
R - Reload weapon

Champions:

Beast

  • Spear(Primary stab, Secondary throw) - Run into spear to pick it up.
  • Claws(Primary to punch)

Mage

  • Staff(Primary cast spell, Secondary switch spell)
  • Spell: Fireball
  • Spell: Restore Health 
  • Spell: Restore Stamina
  • Spell: Restore Mana

Soldier

  • Crossbow(Primary fire, R reloads)
  • Flintlock Pistol(Primary fire, R reloads)
  • Knife(Primary stabs)
